From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

Read more
